title: RITO PLEASE ADD MORE CUSTOMIZATIONS AND FREE FOR ALL
body: Riot i think that more customizations in the custom menu would be a great idea. For example being able to add gold at the beginning if someone wanted to test a build or if they wanted a handicap in a 1v1. Also i think a free for all mode with 10 or 20 players would also be fun. It would be on dominion except there wouldn't be bushes or walls and the last person alive wins.
